sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import { withRouter, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { connect } from "unistore/react"; import { actions, store } from "../stores/MainStore"; class AddBook extends React.Component { handleInput = e => { store.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; render() { const { listPenulis } = this.props; const listAllPenulis = listPenulis.map(item => { return
